Patients high suicide risk Comorbid DSMIV diagnosis psychotic disorder ( current within last year ) , schizophrenia schizoaffective disorder Mental retardation A history drug alcohol abuse dependence within last 3 month Comorbid attention deficit hyperactivity disorder ( ADHD ) , neurological disorder Recent stroke Head injury History seizure , electroconvulsive therapy ( ECT ) within 6 month precede enrolment .
